newsArray.title: BCCI Informs IPL Teams About Bowlers With Suspect Actions Before Auction, List Includes Former CSK Player
newsArray.description: Currently a part of Rajasthan in the domestic circuit, Deepak Hooda has plenty of experience playing in the IPL, and he remains in the suspect category, just like the previous edition of the tournament.
keywords: ipl 2026 auction, ipl 2026 auction news, ipl 2026 auction updates, ipl 2026 auction list, deepak hooda, deepak hooda suspect action, cricket news, cricket
creator: somya kapoor

newsArray.title: IND vs SA 2nd T20: தோல்விக்கு காரணம் யார்..? வாக்குவாதத்தில் கம்பீர் – ஹர்திக்.. வைரலாகும் வீடியோ!
newsArray.description: Hardik - Gambhir Fight Video: இந்திய அணியின் தோல்விக்குப் பிறகு இந்திய டிரஸ்ஸிங் ரூமில் பதட்டமான சூழல் நிலவி வருகிறது. போட்டிக்குப் பிந்தைய வீடியோ தற்போது சமூக ஊடகங்களில் வைரலாகி வருகிறது. இது தலைமை பயிற்சியாளர் கவுதம் கம்பீர் மற்றும் நட்சத்திர வீரர் ஹர்திக் பாண்ட்யா இடையே கடும் வாக்குவாதம் நடைபெற்றது.
creator: Mukesh Kannan

newsArray.title: Fotos y videos: caos e incidentes en la visita de Lionel Messi a la India
newsArray.description: La visita de Lionel Messi a India comenzó con disturbios y tensión en el Estadio Salt Lake de Calcuta, donde el astro argentino debió ser retirado tras una serie de incidentes protagonizados por hinchas. El evento, que había generado una enorme expectativa, se interrumpió apenas 20 minutos después del ingreso del futbolista. Estuvo acompañado de [...]The post Fotos y videos: caos e incidentes en la visita de Lionel Messi a la India appeared first on Diario El Sol Mendoza.
creator: el sol

newsArray.title: IND vs SA, 3rd T20I: Everyone is flexible and open to bat anywhere, says Tilak Varma
newsArray.description: Tilak defended the decision to send Axar Patel at number three in the second T20I. “Axar did this role very well in the 2024 T20 World Cup. On some days, things may not go to plan,” Tilak said.
creator: Ashwin Achal

newsArray.title: Pawan Kalyan | ఉదయం విజ్ఞప్తి, సాయంత్రం మంజూరు..అంధుల క్రికెట్‌ మహిళా కెప్టెన్‌ కోరికను నెరవేర్చిన పవన్‌కల్యాణ్‌
newsArray.description: Pawan Kalyan | అంధ మహిళా క్రికెట్‌ కెప్టెన్‌ దీపిక విజ్ఞప్తికి ఏపీ అధికారులు యుద్ధప్రాతిపదికన స్పందించారు.
creator: limbadri mallepula

newsArray.title: क्या धर्मशाला में बदल जाएगा मैच में टॉस का समय? कितने बजे शुरू होगा तीसरा टी20
newsArray.description: IND vs SA 3rd T20 Cricket Live Telecast: भारत और दक्षिण अफ्रीका के बीच तीसरा टी20 मैच रविवार (14 दिसंबर) को धर्मशाला में खेला जाएगा. दोनों टीमें पांच मैचों की सीरीज में 1-1 से बराबरी पर हैं. यह मुकाबला शाम को खेला जाएगा. उप कप्तान शुभमन गिल पर काफी दबाव है. क्योंकि T20 वर्ल्ड कप सिर्फ छह हफ्ते दूर है और उन्हें भारत की T20 प्लेइंग XI में अपनी जगह पक्की करनी है. कप्तान सूर्यकुमार यादव के लगातार खराब प्रदर्शन पर भी नजरें लगी हैं. क्या तीसरे टी20 को देखने के लिए मैच का समय बदला जाएगा? आइए जानते हैं.
creator: Kamlesh Rai

newsArray.ai_tag: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS

newsArray.description: Virat Kohli is set to play Vijay Hazare Trophy matches at M Chinnaswamy Stadium after KSCA chief Venkatesh Prasad secured government approval post the RCB stampede probe.
creator: ritayan basu

newsArray.title: SRH IPL Auction Strategy: Sunrisers Hyderabad squad gaps, possible targets and purse
newsArray.description: A new year brings new hope. And Sunrisers Hyderabad, with the quality they have, seem very capable of proving that 2025 was just an aberration. The first step to that, though, will take place via a mini-auction in Abu Dhabi on December 16, where they have a bit of shopping to do.
creator: shashwat kumar

newsArray.title: SRH IPL Auction Strategy: Sunrisers Hyderabad squad gaps, possible targets and purse
newsArray.description: A new year brings new hope. And Sunrisers Hyderabad, with the quality they have, seem very capable of proving that 2025 was just an aberration. The first step to that, though, will take place via a mini-auction in Abu Dhabi on December 16, where they have a bit of shopping to do.
creator: shashwat kumar
